title: The Measure of a Gentleman
description: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a partner. Less universally acknowledged is that a single man in possession of very little in the way of fortune may be in want of a partner as well, but John Watson had little time or energy to devote to his own wants or needs...Enter one Mr Holmes...This is a fusion of BBC's Sherlock and Jane Austen's Pride and Prejudice.Words:67087 complete
author: i_ship_an_armada
